adHeader: Honest, fast low cost Tech housecalls.
adDetails: Need an honest techie to tackle your problems without costing you a lot? I will never try to "upsell" you on services or hardware that you don' absolutely need and am happy to answer any question in as much detail as you need. I can handle Mac, PC, home office and entertainment setups and troubleshooting. Give me a call or email for a free quote. Want more info? Visit www.xenocore.org To view my resume: http://www.xenocore.org/Computer_Services/About_Me_files/JMCV7.pdf To view my LinkedIn page: http://www.linkedin.com/pub/james-moody/4b/a7b/765/
